file_content.text: And I'm looking for a wild night out interspersed with one to three pulse-pounding, death-defying dust-ups. Can't always have everything, can we?
Forget about simple thrills. You can say you played a vital role in the successful pursuit of a major criminal.
How would you like to settle for a waking nightmare instead?
If I didn't have other priorities, I'd take you up on that. And then some.
Forget about simple thrills. You can say you played a vital role in the successful pursuit of a major criminal.
How would you like to settle for a waking nightmare instead?
Hey, I was just putting it out there. We're good. Whatever you want to know, I'm your man....
Is that right? Hmm. Been a while since I added a new title to the roster. "Crimebuster!" Like the sound of it. Okay, I'm game....
Good to know I've still got it. Tell you what, since you're obviously of sound mind, body and taste, why don't I give you what you're after....
